headline.print_headline: A Push to Spell Out a Drug’s Risks and Benefits
headline.seo: A Push to Spell Out a Drug’s Risks and Benefits
headline.main: A Push to Spell Out a Drug’s Risks and Benefits

docs.lead_paragraph: Researchers are urging the F.D.A. to develop fact boxes for medicine similar to the nutrition panels on food packaging.
